channel.title: Virtualbox-Whonix - Workstations Vpn-Tor some help
channel.description: Hello all Im new I try find solutions How to run traffic on vpn-tor I have installed new ver VB- Whonix and Workstations -Linux I read this thread https://www.whonix.org/wiki/TestVPN but is not clear for me What setting I need to download form vpn provider UDP or TCP or L2TP or IPsec Vpn must be installed on Gateway or Workstations PS:I just read this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#What.27s_the_difference_of_installing_a_VPN_on_the_host_versus_installing_on_Whonix-Gateway.3F I have installed vpn on pc and run it so Is that mean If I start VB whonix -linux all traffic go from linux vpn-tor ??? Will be Gratefull for any help Thanl you

item.title: Virtualbox-Whonix - Workstations Vpn-Tor some help
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you find the main documentation yet?

Whonix

Features

Whonix Feature List

I try find solutions How to run traffic on vpn-tor
Please use the same terminology copy/paste from documentation to avoid misunderstandings, ex. user -> VPN -> Tor.
I read this thread https://www.whonix.org/wiki/TestVPN but is not clear for me What setting I need to download form vpn provider UDP or TCP or L2TP or IPsec Vpn must be installed on Gateway or Workstations
It gets clear when you read the main documentation which you really should do if you really care about this to work as expected.
PS:I just read this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#What.27s_the_difference_of_installing_a_VPN_on_the_host_versus_installing_on_Whonix-Gateway.3F I have installed vpn on pc and run it so Is that mean If I start VB whonix -linux all traffic go from linux vpn-tor ???
On pc means "on host"? If yes, then traffic goes user -> VPN -> Tor.

Read full topic

item.title: Virtualbox-Whonix - Workstations Vpn-Tor some help
item.dc:creator: duke12
item.description:
Hello all Im new
I try find solutions How to run traffic on vpn-tor
I have installed new ver VB- Whonix and Workstations -Linux
I read this thread https://www.whonix.org/wiki/TestVPN but is not clear for me
What setting I need to download form vpn provider UDP or TCP or L2TP or IPsec
Vpn must be installed on Gateway or Workstations
PS:I just read this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#What.27s_the_difference_of_installing_a_VPN_on_the_host_versus_installing_on_Whonix-Gateway.3F
I have installed vpn on pc and run it so Is that mean If I start VB whonix -linux all traffic go from linux vpn-tor ???
Will be Gratefull for any help
Thanl you

Read full topic
